about_the_game:
Are you afraid of the dark? What about being out of breath?
A horror game in the unlit depths of the ocean.
Together with your friends, you will try to complete the mission, sometimes you have to escape and sometimes you don't. Make sure to do one thing, breathe...





Find and destroy energy cubes to stop the secret organization's experiments.
Don't get lost in the dark and deep waters. Don't get caught!





According to a legend, creatures from another universe traveled to planets and started experimenting with the creatures in that region to increase their qualified population.
They left the planets with unsuccessful results.

However, years later, mutated creatures began to come to life from the genes that were experimented on.

Some people who realized this immediately went after this power and found a cube that was not from this world. They began to conduct top-secret and illegal experiments to access the power.

name: Ocean Gap

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system and broadband Internet connection

short_description: Dive into a co-op underwater horror game. Find and destroy energy cubes to stop the secret organization's experiments. Don't get lost in dark and deep waters. Don't get caught but breathe!
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Czech
